mapper.select: SELECT LOWER(tier) as tier, division, summoner_name, queue, wins, losses, lp, round((wins/(wins+losses))*100,2) as winrate FROM summoner_rank WHERE queue = 'RANKED_SOLO_5x5' ORDER BY lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_name1, sr.most_champ_name2, sr.most_champ_name3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name JOIN RECORD r ON si.summoner_name = r.summoner_name WHERE queue = 'RANKED_FLEX_5x5' ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_name1, sr.most_champ_name2, sr.most_champ_name3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name ORDER BY si.s_level DESC;
